column14:
This table tracks minor program enrollments from Fall 2019 to Spring 2025, with each row showing a specific minor and the number of students each term. The largest minors across this period are Psychological Science, Business, Sociology, and Mathematics, though most show steady declines, while Cybersecurity Technology has grown and new minors like Application of AI, Game Studies, and Quality Management appear only in recent years.

Abbreviations: TESOL = Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages; ASL = American Sign Language; GIS = Geographic Information Science; “Special Minor” = individualized program not tied to a standard minor.
